doc.title: Guardarsi nello specchio degli altri
doc.plot: A girl in a cinema, weeps while she's looking at Godard's film where Anna Karina weeps while she's looking at Drejer's film Jean d'Arc... The boyfriend of the first girl arrives, dries the tears, kisses the girl, invites her to look a new film on the screen: also the boyfriend, the tears dried, the kiss is in the film on the screen...
